articles.author: Ariel Gold, Medea Benjamin
articles.title: #FreeBritney! And while we're at it, free the women of Saudi Arabia too - Salon
articles.description: Britney's case is outrageous — and in Saudi Arabia, virtually all women face the same kind of male subjugation
